summary: Completed comprehensive testing of three match card improvements: team numbering, real-time match minutes, and overflow fix. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Football matches API returns matchMinute field for LIVE matches
NOT_STARTED matches correctly have no matchMinute field
Team numbering (1/2) displayed in match list rows (109 instances each)
Team numbering (1/2) displayed in top match cards (2 instances each)
LIVE matches display match minute next to badges (8 instances: '90+', '86'', 'HT', '44'')
Match minute display works in both regular and compact card formats
Long team names (Wolverhampton Wanderers FC, etc.) contained within card boundaries
No horizontal overflow issues detected on page
Vote buttons clickable when enabled (300 enabled buttons found)
Prediction locking correctly disables buttons for LIVE matches
Live scores display correctly next to team names
Previous features maintained: search, badges, card layouts
